clues.category: THE WIZARDING WORLD OF HARRY POTTER
clues.clue: (Sarah of the Clue Crew shows us a castle at the Wizarding World of Harry Potter at Universal Orlando.)  At the Wizarding World of Harry Potter, you'll see the familiar castle that's home to this prestigious school of witchcraft & wizardry

clues.category: THE WIZARDING WORLD OF HARRY POTTER
clues.clue: (Sarah of the Clue Crew stands on a ladder next to a large shelf full of books at the Wizarding World of Harry Potter at Universal Orlando.) clues.category: THE WIZARDING WORLD OF HARRY POTTER
